meanings.sent1: The airfreight arrived quickly from overseas.
meanings.sent2: We shipped the airfreight using a cargo plane.
meanings.sent3: The airfreight was so light that it almost flew on its own!
meanings.sent4: The importance of airfreight in global trade cannot be overstated.
meanings.sent5: The company specializes in handling delicate airfreight shipments.

meanings.definition: The act of transporting goods by aircraft.
meanings.sent1: Airfreight is a fast way to send packages long distances.
meanings.sent2: The airfreight industry plays a crucial role in the economy.
meanings.sent3: I dream of a world where airfreight is delivered by drones.
meanings.sent4: In times of crisis, airfreight becomes a lifeline for communities in need.
meanings.sent5: The efficiency of airfreight saves businesses time and money.
